original_text: Then he carries it back home. He speaks to all his friends and to the people that live near him. He says, “I have found the sheep that I lost. So come to my house and we can all be happy together.”
korean_text: 집에 와서 그 벗과 이웃을 불러 모으고 말하되 나와 함께 즐기자 나의 잃은 양을 찾아내었노라 하리라

sentences.original_text: Then he carries it back home.
He speaks to all his friends
and to the people that live near him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 근처에 사는 사람들에게도 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: I have found the sheep that I lost.
and we can all be happy together.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 모두 함께 즐거워할 수 있습니다.
